uc3m.bomberman.map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • uc3m.bomberman.map.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all the methods regarding map manipulation such as map generation. A map being a Tile array with Coordinates
    See Also:
    {@link Tile}, {@link Entity}, {@link Player}
